meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>fueling</kanji> (給油) <kanji>place</kanji> is a place where you get things fueled. This can either be a <vocabulary>gas station</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>filling station</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
